issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Build expressions only for the required selection vector types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5701](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5701). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We currently build the JIT for all known selection vector types (there are 4 supported types). For very long expressions, this increases the build time by 4x.

 

Instead, we should build only for the required selection vector type.
